title: Cognitive Engagement Activities - Memory Games for Mental Stimulation
summary: As a retired social worker, I want engaging memory games that adapt to my cognitive abilities so that I can stay mentally active and connected while managing my arthritis pain.

title: Physical Activity Guidance – Gentle Stretching and Mobility Exercises
summary: As a retired social worker, I want guidance on gentle stretching and mobility exercises so that I can stay physically active and manage my arthritis pain effectively.

title: Adaptive Learning for Physical Activities
summary: As a retired social worker, I want customizable difficulty levels for activities so that I can engage in physical and cognitive tasks that suit my current abilities and help me stay active despite my arthritis.

title: Reminders for Daily Activities – Check-Ins for Hydration and Nutrition
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to remind me to stay hydrated and check my nutrition so that I can maintain my physical health while managing my arthritis and busy schedule.

title: Community Engagement Initiatives - Volunteer Opportunities Based on Interests
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to suggest volunteer opportunities based on my interests so that I can stay socially connected and remain active in my community despite my limited mobility.

title: Mindfulness and Relaxation Tools - Guided Meditation for Active Living
summary: As a retired social worker, I want guided meditation sessions integrated into ALFRED so that I can manage my arthritis pain and stay mentally active while maintaining my busy schedule.

title: Personalized Progress Tracking – Goal-Setting for Achievements
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to set and track personal goals for physical and cognitive activities so that I can stay active and engaged while managing my arthritis.
